description: Grants RDP access to a Windows instance for a specified time period.

nested_items.name: TemporaryCredential
nested_items.description: A TemporaryCredential object that contains the data needed to log in to the instance by RDP clients, such as the Microsoft Remote Desktop Connection.

nested_items.name: ValidForInMinutes
nested_items.description: The length of time (in minutes) that the grant is valid. When the grant expires, at the end of this period, the user will no longer be able to use the credentials to log in. If they are logged in at the time, they are automatically logged out.
